definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Here, I'll even give you one of our red bandanas.
sentences.chinese: 來，我要給你代表我們幫派的紅頭巾。

sentences.english: Reenactment: three Yakuza on the streets of Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 東京街頭的三個幫派分子。

sentences.english: Graffiti mark the turfs of rival gangs.
sentences.chinese: 正如生活中一些幫派都有自己的標識。

sentences.english: It has been estimated that the United States now has nearly 800,000 gang members.
sentences.chinese: 據估計現今美國以有約八十萬個幫派成員。

sentences.english: A high school dropout, Bautista now speaks to young people about the dangers of gang life.
sentences.chinese: 高中輟學，現在，她要告訴年輕人幫派生活的危害。

sentences.english: We also fought with other gangs.
sentences.chinese: 我們還和其他幫派打架。

sentences.english: Chen is now more cautious, wary of gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 陳致遠如今變得更加謹慎，小心提防幫派分子。

sentences.english: He has already broken with that gang.
sentences.chinese: 他已經和那個幫派組織決裂了。

sentences.english: Today gang members barely into their teens can earn more money than their parents.
sentences.chinese: 現在，才十幾歲的幫派成員就能比他們父母掙得多。

sentences.english: Gang money winning the local hearts and minds.
Girls in gangs are just as likely to participate in beatings as boys.
sentences.chinese: 加入幫派的女孩很有可能像男孩一般參與鬥毆。

sentences.english: Do all these show the conspiratory gang has formed ?
sentences.chinese: 這些就能說是構成了一個陰謀幫派嗎？

sentences.english: Today, tagging is not confined to gangs.
sentences.chinese: 今天，“留名”並非僅爲幫派所用。

sentences.english: Fighting among these groups has undermined progress in controlling violence.
sentences.chinese: 黑社會幫派之間的火併破壞了警方鎮壓暴力的進程。

sentences.english: After only a few nights, dawn reveals new gang spray-paintings.
sentences.chinese: 可過不了幾個夜晚，就又出現了新噴塗上的幫派標記。

sentences.english: Hence the gang culture that is so destructive.
sentences.chinese: 因此幫派文化才如此有破壞性。

definition: bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
triad, Chinese crime gang/triad society, anti-Manchu secret society in Qing-dynasty China
to parade sb through the streets/to march or parade in the streets
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
